name: Graverobber
description:
The greatest treasures lie the deepest... It’s dark - the cold bites at your skin Wind gusts seem to whisper warnings - asking you to leave You pay the voices no mind - your shovel slices into the dirt You hear discordant footsteps - you keep digging Riches and baubles await you - six feet underground

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Right Click to Shovel
  • Using the shovel gives some invincibility frames
  • Hitting an enemy with the shovel resets the attack cooldown and triggers a combo (you can chain invincibility frames)
  • Missing an attack triggers a movement slowdown

Tools used:

  • Unity
  • Multiple, real-life shovels
  • Paint.net

Created for Ludum Dare 48 in less than 48 hours

Headphones Strongly Recommended
